uk.ac.man.cs.mig.util.graph.controller

Interface GraphGenerator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EventListener, PropertyChangeListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultGraphGenerator

    public interface GraphGenerator
extends PropertyChangeListener
    User: matthewhorridge
    The Univeristy Of Manchester
    Medical Informatics Group
    Date: Dec 27, 2003

    matthew.horridge@cs.man.ac.uk
    www.cs.man.ac.uk/~horridgm

    Creates/updates the graph containing visualised nodes and edges. Listeners can register themselves with the GraphGenerator so that they are informed about changes to the Graph.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGraphGeneratorListener(GraphGeneratorListener lsnr)
      Adds a listener that is informed of events generated by the GraphGenerator, such as a 'graph changed' event.
      Graph getGraph()
      Gets the Graph based upon the visible objects in the VisualisedObjectManager.
      Iterator getGraphGeneratorListeners()
      Gets an Iterator that can be used to traverse the listeners.
      Node getNodeForObject(Object obj)
      Returns the Node that represents the given object.
      VisualisedObjectManager getVisualisedObjectManager()
      Retrieves the VisualisedObjectManager, which graphs are based upon.
      void invalidateGraph()
      Causes the Graph to be rebuilt.
      void removeGraphGeneratorListener(GraphGeneratorListener lsnr)
      Removes a previously added GraphGeneratedListener
      void setVisualisedObjectManager(VisualisedObjectManager manager)
      Sets the VisualisedObjectManager, which the GraphGenerator bases the Graph on.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.beans.PropertyChangeListener

        propertyChange

    • Method Detail

      • getVisualisedObjectManager

        VisualisedObjectManager getVisualisedObjectManager()
        Retrieves the VisualisedObjectManager, which graphs are based upon.
        Returns:
        The VisualisedObjectManager

      • setVisualisedObjectManager

        void setVisualisedObjectManager(VisualisedObjectManager manager)
        Sets the VisualisedObjectManager, which the GraphGenerator bases the Graph on.
        Parameters:
        manager - The VisualisedObjectManager to use.

      • getGraph

        Graph getGraph()
        Gets the Graph based upon the visible objects in the VisualisedObjectManager.
        Returns:
        A Graph representing visible objects. Note that this Graph may or may not be newly created.

      • getNodeForObject

        Node getNodeForObject(Object obj)
        Returns the Node that represents the given object.
        Parameters:
        obj - The object.
        Returns:
        The Node that represents the object, or null if the Graph does not contain a Node that represents the given object.

      • invalidateGraph

        void invalidateGraph()
        Causes the Graph to be rebuilt.

      • addGraphGeneratorListener

        void addGraphGeneratorListener(GraphGeneratorListener lsnr)
        Adds a listener that is informed of events generated by the GraphGenerator, such as a 'graph changed' event.
        Parameters:
        lsnr - The listener to be added.

      • removeGraphGeneratorListener

        void removeGraphGeneratorListener(GraphGeneratorListener lsnr)
        Removes a previously added GraphGeneratedListener
        Parameters:
        lsnr - The listener to be removed.

      • getGraphGeneratorListeners

        Iterator getGraphGeneratorListeners()
        Gets an Iterator that can be used to traverse the listeners.
        Returns:
        The Iterator, which can also be used to add and remove listeners.
